title: Russian President Putin felicitates PM Shehbaz Sharif
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 12 (APP): President of Russia Vladimir Putin Tuesday congratulated Shehbaz Sharif on his election as Prime Minister of Pakistan.
In a congratulatory message, the Russian president expressed the hope that Shehbaz Sharif would contribute to the further development of Pakistan-Russia cooperation, according to the Russian Embassy in Islamabad.
Putin also hoped that during Shehbaz Sharifâ€™s tenure, Pakistan and Russia would continue to partnering interaction on Afghan settlement and countering international terrorism.
